Interact with the WordLift Agent to process a message and receive an AI-driven response.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"message":{"type":"string","title":"Message"},"model":{"type":"string","title":"Model","default":"gpt-4o"},"security":{"type":"boolean","title":"Security","default":false}},"type":"object","required":["message"],"title":"AskRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
